ProjectedTexture/GetAngles.description: Returns the angle of the ProjectedTexture, which were previously set by

ProjectedTexture/GetBrightness.description: Returns the brightness of the ProjectedTexture, which was previously set by

ProjectedTexture/GetColor.description: Returns the color of the ProjectedTexture, which was previously set by

ProjectedTexture/GetEnableShadows.description: Returns whether shadows are enabled for this ProjectedTexture, which was previously set by

ProjectedTexture/GetFarZ.description: Returns the projection distance of the ProjectedTexture, which was previously set by

ProjectedTexture/GetHorizontalFOV.description: Returns the horizontal FOV of the ProjectedTexture, which was previously set by

ProjectedTexture/GetNearZ.description: Returns the NearZ value of the ProjectedTexture, which was previously set by

ProjectedTexture/GetOrthographic.description: Returns the current orthographic settings of the Projected Texture. To set these values, use

ProjectedTexture/GetPos.description: Returns the position of the ProjectedTexture, which was previously set by

ProjectedTexture/GetTexture.description: Returns the texture of the ProjectedTexture, which was previously set by

ProjectedTexture/GetTextureFrame.description: Returns the texture frame of the ProjectedTexture, which was previously set by

ProjectedTexture/GetVerticalFOV.description: Returns the vertical FOV of the ProjectedTexture, which was previously set by

ProjectedTexture/IsValid.description: Returns true if the projected texture is valid (i.e. has not been removed), false otherwise.

ProjectedTexture/Remove.description: Removes the projected texture. After calling this,

ProjectedTexture/SetAngles.description: Sets the angles (direction) of the projected texture.

ProjectedTexture/SetBrightness.description: Sets the brightness of the projected texture.

ProjectedTexture/SetColor.description: Sets the color of the projected texture.

ProjectedTexture/SetEnableShadows.description: Enable or disable shadows cast from the projected texture.

ProjectedTexture/SetFarZ.description: Sets the distance at which the projected texture ends.

ProjectedTexture/SetHorizontalFOV.description: Sets the horizontal angle of projection without affecting the vertical angle.

ProjectedTexture/SetNearZ.description: Sets the distance at which the projected texture begins its projection.

ProjectedTexture/SetOrthographic.description: Changes the current projected texture between orthographic and perspective projection.

ProjectedTexture/SetPos.description: Move the Projected Texture to the specified position.

ProjectedTexture/SetTexture.description: Sets the texture to be projected.

ProjectedTexture/SetTextureFrame.description: For animated textures, this will choose which frame in the animation will be projected.

ProjectedTexture/SetVerticalFOV.description: Sets the vertical angle of projection without affecting the horizontal angle.

ProjectedTexture/Update.description: Updates the Projected Light and applies all previously set parameters.
